about_the_game:
Note: This DLC requires the More Colors DLC and The Cenozoic Era base game to play.

DLC Description: Natural Eye Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era

Enhance the realism of your prehistoric creatures with the Natural Eye Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era. This DLC adds a range of lifelike, natural eye colors, from deep browns to vibrant greens and blues, giving your animal more personality and realism.

Features:

  • Lifelike Eye Colors: Customize the eye colors of your Cenozoic creatures with a variety of realistic shades, including browns, greens, blues, and more.

  • Enhanced Creature Detail: Bring a new level of depth and personality to your animals by adjusting their eye colors to match their unique traits.

  • Improved Visual Immersion: Enjoy a more authentic and captivating prehistoric world with creatures that feel more alive.

name: The Cenozoic Era - Natural Eye Color Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Natural Eye Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era adds realistic eye colors to your creatures, from deep browns to vibrant greens and blues, enhancing their personality and realism.
